author: Warhammer
description:
Here’s your official look into the next evolution of the iconic real-time strategy franchise with Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV!
First revealed during PC Gaming Show: Tokyo Direct, this new trailer has been captured entirely from in-engine gameplay. 

Many years after the events of Dawn of War: Dark Crusade, Kronus burns as Space Marines of the Blood Ravens Chapter and their Adeptus Mechanicus allies clash with brutal Ork hordes. With victory almost certain, a new threat emerges: the Necrons. As this new faction overwhelms the battlefield, the Imperium must rebuild and grow their forces if they hope to stand a chance. 

Whether you’re a long-time fan of the series or brand new to the world of Dawn of War, this new trailer, captured entirely in-engine, provides a more detailed look at what to expect with exciting gameplay, action-packed cinematics, and a taste of the war-torn future that awaits.

At last, back to war! 
---

Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV releases on Steam in 2026!
title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War IV – "Back to War" In-Engine Trailer | PC Gaming Show Tokyo Direct
